moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4: as in previous games I like to play the Queens Gambit
moves.3... Bf5: a nice place for his bishop
moves.5. Bg5: trying to make him play f6, blocking the square for his knight
moves.6. Bxe7: I accept so I don't lose a tempo
moves.6... Nxe7 7. e3: trying to develop my last piece
moves.9. Qxd3 Nf5: maybe he should of castled this doesn't earn anything
moves.12... a6 13. Qa4: keeping the pin so I don't get double pawns
moves.16. Qxd7+: I trade because I want my knight on c5
moves.18... Rd6: When I say, Why does he play this I don't mean to be mean I'm just wondering. Why does he play this
moves.19... b5: great move because both pawns are now defended
moves.20. Rca1: putting my rook behind my pawn
moves.21... bxa4: he shouldn't have accepted now he loses a pawn
moves.24... Rbc6: he tries to take the file
moves.25... Nd6: getting his knight into the action
moves.26. g3: allowing myself to get my rook off the back row
moves.26... Nc4 27. Rb1: getting ym rook behind the pawn
moves.29. Nxe4: I happily accept giving him double pawns
moves.29... Rc6c1+: this is a good moves it doesn't allow me to get my king into the action
moves.32... Rc6: here he should have played Rcc8
moves.33. b7: his last chance he must play Rd6 and get both rooks to the last row
moves.33... Rc7: He loses with a nice combination by me
moves.34. Ra8: pinning his rook, if he takes i have a queen
moves.35. Rxb8+: ! if I had take the other rook it would have been tied but now I'm up a rook
moves.36. Rxb8+: now I'm up five points and I just need to finish an easy endgame
moves.38. Rd8 g6 39. Rxd5 f5: from here its an easy endgame
moves.40... exf3+ 41. Kxf3 Kg7 42. Kf4: I try and get my king into the action
moves.42... Kf6: he tries to stop he me
moves.43. Rd6+: pushing his king onto the seventh row
moves.44... h5 45. Rd7+: forcing him onto the 8th row or h6
moves.45... Kh6 46. Kf6: trying to get a mate in 2
moves.46... g5 47. Rd8 Kh7 48. Kxg5: his only move to stop mate but now I take his pawns and he resigns great game by Porcho but once again a few mistakes make the difference. I hope you liked the game, please rate and comment.
